blogPost.excerpt: It's easy to forget to take time out of your day for mindfulness and meditation. The Silent Podcast is an automated podcast feed that provides a daily 10-minute pocket of quiet and stillness in your routine.
blogPost.body: It's easy to forget to take time out of your day for mindfulness and meditation. The Silent Podcast is an automated podcast feed that provides a daily 10-minute pocket of quiet and stillness in your routine.
blogPost.title: The Silent Podcast - A daily 10 minutes pocket of stillness in your podcast feed
blogPost.author: Gabriel Krieshok

localize.description: 人们很容易忘记从一天中抽出时间来进行心态和冥想。沉默的播客是一个自动播客源，为您的日常工作提供了一个每天10分钟的安静和静谧的口袋。
localize.tagline: 每天10分钟的静止口袋在您的播客饲料

localize.description: 人們很容易忘記從一天中抽出時間來進行心態和冥想。沉默的播客是一個自動播客源，爲您的日常工作提供了一個每天10分鐘的安靜和靜謐的口袋。
localize.tagline: 每天10分鐘的靜止口袋在您的播客飼料

previous.excerpt: Verso is a universal mobile cashback application available on iOS and android. Verso rewards user's purchases made from the app in BTU cryptocurrency. BTU can be redeemed into any gift card of the user's choice inside the app.
previous.title: Verso - Earn free crypto as cashback

localize.description: Verso是一款通用的移动返现应用，可在iOS和android上使用。Verso以BTU加密货币奖励用户在应用内的购物。BTU可以在应用内兑换成用户选择的任何礼品卡。
localize.tagline: 赚取免费的加密货币作为现金回馈

localize.description: Verso是一款通用的移動返現應用，可在iOS和android上使用。Verso以BTU加密貨幣獎勵用戶在應用內的購物。BTU可以在應用內兌換成用戶選擇的任何禮品卡。
localize.tagline: 賺取免費的加密貨幣作爲現金回饋

next.excerpt: The SEO Onpage extension for Google Chrome that makes SEO daily tasks easier, as you can check easily if the url you are browsing has any Onpage SEO issues, even if the web uses Javascript rendering. It integrates with "Inspect URL" in Google Search Console.
next.title: SEO Station - The SEO Onpage extension for Chrome that makes SEO easier

localize.description: Google Chrome浏览器的SEO Onpage扩展，让SEO日常工作变得更简单，因为你可以轻松地检查你正在浏览的url是否有任何Onpage SEO问题，即使网页使用Javascript渲染。它集成了谷歌搜索控制台中的 "检查URL"。
localize.tagline: 让SEO更容易的Chrome浏览器的SEO Onpage扩展功能

localize.description: Google Chrome瀏覽器的SEO Onpage擴展，讓SEO日常工作變得更簡單，因爲你可以輕鬆地檢查你正在瀏覽的url是否有任何Onpage SEO問題，即使網頁使用Javascript渲染。它集成了谷歌搜索控制檯中的 "檢查URL"。
localize.tagline: 讓SEO更容易的Chrome瀏覽器的SEO Onpage擴展功能
